Title: Hou De Jarasa Ushir
Writer: Wasim Maner (story), Nikhil Dixit (screenplay), Rahul Ovhal (screenplay), Tahir Maner (screenplay), Goutham Av (screenplay), Wasim Maner (dialogue), Tahir Maner (dialogue), Nikhil Dixit (dialogue), Rahul Ovhal (dialogue), Goutham Av (dialogue)
Actors: Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Aishwarya Narkar, Sharvari Jamenis, Chinmay Mandlekar
Plot: Hou De Jarasa Ushir is the story of three people, each one fighting a lonely battle trying to balance work and life.
